content.raw:
OSRF should replace the raw velocity used in the PD controller and shipped to the user in atlas_states with a filtered velocity. The user should be able to set the filtering, and by setting the filtering coefficients appropriately, have no filtering at all. The filtering can be the same for all joints, or user settable for each joint.

The justification for this is in this discussion
#!/osrf/drcsim/pull-request/248/per-issue-194-alternative-solution-add-ros/diff

and on this web page
http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~cga/drc/bdi2/

I have already shipped the relevant code to drcsim@osrffoundation.org
